fields.description:
XHR-Error callback - Connection failure error.
This is not regression. Issue occurs on 3.1.2 GA as well

Steps to reproduce:
1. Go to Kitchensink> Platform> XHR> error callback
2. Observe the screen

Actual:
Message displayed on the screen,"A connection failure occured". Please refer to attached screenshot.

Expected:
Should get:
UTF-8 GET
www.fre100.com
fields.summary: iOS: XHR Error Callback - Connection failure error

Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
